title: Implement real-time data synchronization system
description: Create data synchronization framework that maintains consistency across distributed systems with conflict resolution and automatic failover capabilities
asA: system architect managing distributed data consistency
iWant: real-time data synchronization with conflict resolution and failover support
soThat: I can ensure data consistency across systems within 500ms while maintaining 99.9% availability
acceptanceCriteria: Data synchronization completes within 500ms across all nodes
Conflict resolution automatically handles concurrent updates
Failover mechanism maintains service availability during node failures
Monitoring dashboard displays sync status and performance metrics
